:rotating_light: Early Access to App Cards Powered by UI Extensions is Here  :tada:  We're thrilled to announce this game-changing update to the future of customization on the HubSpot platform!   :fire: What's New:  • More surfaces for stickier apps
• Customizable, HubSpot-native design
• Seamless, context-aware app experiences
 :hammer_and_wrench: Key Features:  • Extensibility in record middle column, right sidebar and help desk ticket sidebar
• Figma Design Kit for visual customization
• HubSpot CLI and UI extensions SDK for streamlined development  For more details on early access and the next generation of HubSpot apps, visit the UI Extensions landing page and refer to our latest blog post for additional information. :mag:  View Landing Page button :link:  View Blog Post button
